author: Charlie Spiering, Charlie Spiering
title: Donald Trump Announces 'Opening the Country Council' for Restarting Economy
description: The president said that he would put doctors, business leaders, and other advisers on the council to help him decide when was the best time to allow Americans to go back to work.
content:
President Donald Trump on Friday at the White House announced that he would draft an economic advisory council focused on reopening the country.
“I call it the ‘opening of the country council,’ so we don’t get it confused with Mike’s task force, which has do… [+1157 chars]
